propList.Name: arrow
propList.Description: Whether the dropdown arrow should be visible

propList.Name: disabled
propList.Description: Whether the dropdown menu is disabled

propList.Name: getPopupContainer
propList.Description: To set the container of the dropdown menu. The default is to create a div element in body, but you can reset it to the scrolling area and make a relative reposition. Example on CodePen

propList.Name: overlayClassName
propList.Description: The class name of the dropdown root element

propList.Name: overlayStyle
propList.Description: The style of the dropdown root element

propList.Name: placement
propList.Description: Placement of popup menu: bottomLeft, bottomCenter, bottomRight, topLeft, topCenter or topRight

propList.Name: trigger
propList.Description: The trigger mode which executes the dropdown action. Note that hover can't be used on touchscreens

propList.Name: visible
propList.Description: Whether the dropdown menu is currently visible

propList.Name: onVisibleChange
propList.Description: Called when the visible state is changed. Not trigger when hidden by click item
